name: The Deeper the Deadlier
description:
Story: You are a liberator- A machine tasked with killing an alien infection of a planet which is destroying the planet slowly. You must go deeper and deeper to purge the infection and destroy the monster at the core controlling and creating more of these parasites.

![cover img.png](///raw/f87/b3/z/3dae1.png)

Info: Made in Unity using the A* plugin, art made in Paint3D, Microsoft Paint and Adobe Photoshop

Credits:

   Unity devs: Fredripper, EPU, RustyLegacy

   Art: Corndawg, CursedFlames, Warrior110, BaguetteDoggo

   Music: HyperAzpect, CursedFlames
